emailBody.html1: You have raised a new dispute for order
emailBody.html2:
. This case is being reviewed by the FBO to address the concerns that have been raised. If you have any questions, you can check for status updates on the dispute section or contact the FBO directly for more information. Thank you for your patience!

The Barrel Fuel Team
